title: Potential Buffer Overflow in readDeviceId
description: The function readDeviceId does not check if the input buffer size is less than the expected device ID size (0x10 bytes). If a smaller buffer is passed, it could lead to a buffer overflow.
fix: Add a check at the beginning of the readDeviceId function to ensure that outBufSize is at least 0x10 before proceeding with the read operation.
